summary: In the sequel to the Tsui Hark classic, Wong Fei-Hung faces The White Lotus society, a fanatical cult seeking to drive the Europeans out of China through violence, even attacking Chinese ... See full summary »
cast: Jet Li|Rosamund Kwan|Siu Chung Mok|David Chiang|Donnie Yen|Tielin Zhang|Xin Xin Xiong|Paul Fonoroff|Shi-Kwan Yen|Ka-Kui Ho|Michael Miller|Dion Lam|Shu-Kei Chow|Joseph Chi|Chuen Chiang|Siu-Wah Chan|Chi-Hung Ling|Kwai Po Chun|Chi Wah Ling|Shing-Hung Leung|Kin-Ming Tsang|Ernst Mausser|Chi-Mun Ho|Yat-Ho Leung|Tai Wo Tang|Kim-Ban Wong|Mike Leeder|Adrian Palmer
title: Érase una vez en China II
